newsitem.title: israel: Israeli soldier shot in West Bank, may be accident.
newsitem.headline: Israeli soldier shot in West Bank, may be accident.

text.p: An Israeli soldier was shot and wounded near the West Bank town of Hebron in unclear circumstances on Friday, Israel Radio and security sources said.
The radio and Jewish settlers initially said the soldier was "moderately" wounded in an apparent drive-by shooting while guarding the Jewish Har Hamasa settlement south of Hebron.
Later, security sources and the radio said the only shells found at the scene were from the soldier's gun and the army was investigating whether the soldier could have accidentally shot himself.
The army said it was checking the reports.
Hebron is a volatile town split since January between Israeli and Palestinian control.
